definition: a type of standing harp, smaller than konghou 箜篌, with 5-25 strings
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: The stories of the Knights of the Round Table make up the Arthurian cycle.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王傳奇是由一些圓桌武士的故事構成。

sentences.english: Based on a king Arthur and the sorcerers story.
sentences.chinese: 本劇根據亞瑟王與魔法師梅林的故事改編。

sentences.english: Arthur is pressured into an arranged marriage with a visiting princess.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王子遭受壓力和一位拜訪上門的公主成親。

sentences.english: Like, King Arthur, with knights and horses.
sentences.chinese: 就像亞瑟王時代，有騎士和戰馬的時代。

sentences.english: People who study the past think there was.
sentences.chinese: 研究歷史的人認爲確有亞瑟王其人。

sentences.english: Queen Guinevere rode next to King Arthur's army followed.
sentences.chinese: 格溫妮維爾王后跟隨在亞瑟王的軍隊之後。

sentences.english: The term was used as the Arthurian legends developed in Welsh literature.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞用於威爾士文學中的亞瑟王傳奇。

sentences.english: The story of King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table has been one of the most popular stories in world literature.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王與圓桌騎士的故事在世界文學中名氣很大。

sentences.english: He was honoured for Arthur and died last year aged 96.
sentences.chinese: 他因出演《亞瑟王》而獲獎，去年謝世，享年96歲。

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold .
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王本人被描繪成一個被人戴綠帽子的軟弱之人。

sentences.english: She studies under Merlin, but is plotting all the time to overthrow Arthur and his court at Camelot.
sentences.chinese: 師從梅林，卻一直想要推翻亞瑟王的卡米洛特政權。

sentences.english: King Arthur tried to redress wrongs in his kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王設法糾正他國內的弊端。

sentences.english: This picture represents a scene at King Arthur's court.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫描繪了亞瑟王法庭的一個場面。

sentences.english: The Round Table Knights were a group of greatest knights who had the honour to sit at the Round Table at King Arthur’s court.
sentences.chinese: 圓桌騎士是亞瑟王宮廷裏有權在圓桌旁就座的騎士。

sentences.english: A sign in purple calligraphy says that King Arthur will be appearing at noon.
sentences.chinese: 紫色手寫的牌子上通知亞瑟王中午會出場。

sentences.english: Blockbuster and world legend about king Artur - on your telephone.
sentences.chinese: 在手機上去演繹亞瑟王的偉大歷史傳奇。

definition: to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
Joan of Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
